title: 5 Ingredient Mexican Rice
directions: Combine all ingredients into a medium, non-stick skillet or pot. Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 25 minutes.

Remove from heat and let rice stand with lid on for about 10 minutes. Remove the lid and fluff the rice with a fork. Serve alongside just about anything or inside delicious homemade tacos with Mexican shredded chicken!
